title: Scourge
description: On her sixteenth birthday, Hannah did not get a sweet sixteen party, instead, her life turned for the worst. Now, at the age of twenty-five, she is doing her best to not go crazy from the haunting dreams she gets. She had thought her life couldnâ€™t get any crazier until she finds herself teaming up with a mysterious doctor and a sarcastic police. What does she have in common with the two men? Death. Each of them holds a personal grudge against death.What could go wrong?
author: Maurin Lee
